kw.name: เชื่อมต่อระบบ API
Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login path_url=/api/auth/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '55', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "admin@example.com", "password": "123456789"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Token ที่ได้คือ: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJjbWxrcHh0MTYwMDAwbTYyYXc1bXVhd3I2Iiwicm9sZSI6IkFETUlOIiwiaWF0IjoxNzcxMjM3NTYxLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNDExNjF9.CAVwUdaffCs6YZIuTUznjaC2T-ZzcGR1yH8RzWIHeZ4
kw.arg: Token ที่ได้คือ: ${TOKEN}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
ยิง API Login และเก็บ Token ไว้ในตัวแปร
